input.sentences: we enjoyed a day at the marina .
there was a beautiful park and place to walk or sit near the water .
lots of different types of boats were at the docks .
i liked seeing the rocks and cement anchors .
i think this playground has been here for awhile .
output.sentences: It was going to be a fun day at the marina.
We went out to sit by the water.
The boats were busy sailing around.
There were a bunch of rock and cement anchors.
We also went to the playground for awhile.
